text: (nabivaraya) numbata pera (vividha gam palatvalata) panividakaruvan (rasulvarun) lesa apa visin vahi (deva vadan) pahalakarana lada siyallanma pirimin lesa ha ema nagaravalata ayat pirisak vuha. ovuhu mahapolovehi særisara adhiksanaya kara nobalannoda? ese kale nam ovunata pera sitiyavunge avasanaya kese vi dæyi ovunata dækagata hækiva tibuni. biya bætimat ayata avasan nivahana utumya. numbala vataha nogannehu da
